TextLibrary.Text: This weapons dealer also sold complete weapons to two other groups. One of them was, suprisingly, a group of Quesadans. I'm not sure what use they have for such weapons, being a peaceloving people. They'll likely have military tasks for us to accomplish on their behalf as they have few capable fighters.
